name: Knockin' Around Space
description:
Fight against the forces of your ship as you move through a handful of short levels.

Unfortunately I left the making levels bit a little too late, so there are only 5 currently.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys / WASD / Left Thumbstick? - Move around

Escape - Close the game

R - Restart the current level (past level 1)

CREDITS

Code - Mostly me

Sci-fi Interior Tiles - Buch

Mage Character - saint11

Bomb Sound Effect - Luke

Other Music and SFX (+ Ship Sprite) - Previous Humble Bundle assets

KNOWN BUGS

The ship in the opening does not fully move off-screen for some reason.
